Short Life 2 is an exciting game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, your hero continues to risk their life as they face 20 new levels filled with even more danger and deadly traps. The objective remains the same: to reach the end of each level alive, preferably without sustaining serious injuries. To navigate through the treacherous obstacles, you must utilize your skills of running, jumping, and crouching. Be prepared to dodge countless traps, such as circular saws, sharp pikes, and flaming bombs. Success in Short Life 2 requires precise control over your character's movements in order to ensure their survival. If you're up for the challenge, you can play this game for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
